a:t.name: pseudocode

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: 3 primary doses without a booster dose (3p)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: 3 primary doses with a booster dose (3p+1)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: 2 primary doses with a booster dose (2p+1)
